description: Entity used to provide reference to an external system.
title: externalSystemReference

___name.description: The name of the actual externalSystemReference.

$eref.description: Specifies relationships between the current document and an external resource.
$eref.title: link

___href.description: A URL. Specifies the location of the linked document.

___type.description: Specifies the media type of the linked document.

___title.description: Provide additional / advisory information (expand on the meaning of the link).

___method.description: Specifies how to send the data (e.g. get, post).

___rel.description: Specifies the relationship between the current document and the linked document.

___link.description: A self referencing link to the externalSystemReference resource.

___systemName.description: The name of the external system providing the reference.

___description.description: A description of the actual ExternalSystemReference.

___referenceId.description: The external reference ID from the external system.

___id.description: An unique identifier for the externalSystemReference.

___referenceType.description: The type of reference ID (e.g., Service Code).
